languages.text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза, словно услыхал нечто невероятно глупое.{/n} "Грандиозные шпили безмозглости вкупе с неописуемыми безднами способностей — опасное сочетание в одном мон-кай".

{n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза, словно услыхал нечто невероятно глупое.{/n} "Грандиозные шпили безмозглости вкупе с неописуемыми безднами способностей — опасное сочетание в одном мон-кай".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos como si acabara de oír algo tremendamente insulso.{/n} «Las mayores cotas de la estupidez y las mayores profundidades del oportunismo son una combinación peligrosa para un solo mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos como si acabara de escuchar algo tremendamente insulso.{/n} «Las mayores cotas de la estupidez y las mayores profundidades de la competencia en un único mon-keigh: eso trae problemas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ferme à moitié les yeux, comme s'il venait d'entendre une ineptie sans nom.{/n} « Des sommets de stupidité, associés à une mine sans fond d'opportunités... Voilà une combinaison bien dangereuse pour un mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ferme à moitié les yeux, comme s'il venait d'entendre une ineptie sans nom.{/n} « De tels sommets de stupidité et une aptitude aux profondeurs insondables chez un même mon-keigh constituent un véritable danger. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、ひどく馬鹿げたこと聞いたと言わんばかりに半眼になる。{/n}「大いなる愚かさと計り知れないほどの機会は、ひとりのモン＝ケイにとって危険な組み合わせだってのか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、ひどく馬鹿げたこと聞いたと言わんばかりに半眼になる。{/n}「大いなる愚かさと計り知れないほどの機会は、ひとりのモン＝ケイにとって危険な組み合わせだってのか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schließt halb die Augen, als hätte er gerade etwas unsäglich Blödsinniges gehört.{/n} "Große Türme aus Dummheit und unergründliche Tiefen der Gelegenheit in einem einzigen Chem-Pan-Sey sind eine gefährliche Mischung."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schließt halb die Augen, als hätte er gerade etwas unsäglich Blödsinniges gehört.{/n} "Große Türme aus Dummheit und unergründliche Tiefen der Fähigkeit in einem einzigen Chem-Pan-Sey sind eine gefährliche Mischung."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋半闭着眼睛，仿佛听到了什么无稽之谈一样。{/n}“这只猴子带着愚不可及的疯狂，怀着深不可测的阴谋，这可相当危险。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋半闭着眼睛，仿佛听到了什么无稽之谈一样。{/n}“这只猴子身上带着愚不可及的疯狂与深不可测的阴谋，这意味着危险。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, saçma bir şey duymuş gibi gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Büyük aptallık kuleleri ve akıl sır ermez olanaklarla dolu derinlikler, tek bir mon-keigh için fazla tehlikeli bir ikili olmuş."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes as if he has just heard something incredibly inane.{/n} "Grand spires of stupidity and unfathomable depths of opportunity is a dangerous combination for a single mon-keigh."
